docstring.long_description:
Only used for the GPIB port (not the serial port). These settings depend on
the instrument you are using.

EOI - end of interrupt (use terminator or not)
EOS - end of string (termination character)

Requires an OPEN_SERIAL block.
docstring.short_description: Sets the EOI and EOS settings for the Prologix GPIB-USB adapter.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The open serial connection with the instrument.

returns.description: Response from the Prologix USB-to-GPIB controller.
